description: Mask configuration for Fujifilm 4450HD endoscope processor
notes: PLACEHOLDER COORDINATES - Verify with real Fujifilm 4450HD video footage
1. Open reference video in video player with frame info
2. Identify leftmost visible endoscope pixel (X coordinate)
3. Identify topmost visible endoscope pixel (Y coordinate)
4. Measure endoscope image width (typically 1300-1350px for HD)
5. Measure endoscope image height (typically 1000-1080px for HD)
6. Update this file with measured values
7. Test masking with sample video to verify black bars are correct
